declarative_rewrite.content_script: <style>.logo a::before { font-size: 2rem; display: inline-block; content: 'Tech Times' }</style><script>[...document.querySelectorAll('.mkem')].forEach(o => {let d = o.dataset, l = document.createElement('a'); l.textContent = `${d.first + d.last}@${d.domain}`; l.href = `mailto:${l.textContent}`; o.appendChild(l);})</script>

url_rules: ! Initial support aimed for almanac, articles, license, and screencasts

declarative_rewrite.content_script: <style>nav.breadcrumbs ul { display: flex } nav.breadcrumbs li { flex: 1; list-style: none } span.watch-video-button { vertical-align: middle } .almanac-headers { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr } .almanac-letter-row { min-height: 2em; padding-top: 1em; display: grid; grid-template-columns: 75px 1fr calc(75px + 2rem) 1fr; border-top: 1px solid #201c29 } .browser-support-table { width: 100% } .browser-support-table td { text-align: center } header { margin-bottom: 1em } .mega-header-header > span { display: block; margin-bottom: 1em } .logo { margin-bottom: 1em } .logo a { text-decoration: none } iframe { width: 100% }</style><script>[...document.querySelectorAll('img[data-lazy-src]')].forEach(x=>x.srcset='')</script>

main_content_cleanup: figure > div > div > div > div > div > div > div

declarative_rewrite.content_script: <script>function resizeIframe(obj) { obj.style.minHeight = "270px"; obj.style.height = obj.contentWindow.document.documentElement.scrollHeight + "px"; obj.style.width = "100%"; } [...document.querySelectorAll(".thirdparty-embed__iframe")].map(o => o.height = ""); [...document.querySelectorAll(".chart-js iframe, .thirdparty-embed__iframe")].map(resizeIframe);</script>

<script>
 document.querySelector(".FeaturedMedia figure img").src =
 JSON.parse(document.querySelector('script[type="application/ld+json"]').innerText).image.url;
 [...document.querySelectorAll(".InlineImage .Image__Wrapper img")]
 .map((e, i) => e.src =
 __abcnews__.page.content.story.everscroll[0].inlines.filter(d => d.type === "image").map(i => i.imageSrc)[i])
 </script>
